title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not set correctly.
OB: When creating a nested class using the new class wizard, the context is not set correctly.
EB: The context should be set correctly when creating a nested class using the new class wizard.
SR:
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Select the option to create a nested class.
3. Follow the wizard steps to create the nested class.
4. Check if the context is set correctly for the nested class.
